00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import os
00004 
00005 tests = [ 'test_unknown_token',
00006           'test_invalid_param1',
00007           'test_invalid_param2',
00008           'test_invalid_param3',
00009           'test_invalid_keyword' ]
00010 
00011 num_passed = 0
00012 num_failed = 0
00013 for t in tests:
00014     if os.system('./../../scripts/mk_parser.py %s.cli | diff - %s.out' % (t, t)) == 0:
00015         print 'PASS: %s' % t
00016         num_passed += 1
00017     else:
00018         print 'FAIL: %s' %t
00019         num_failed += 1
00020 print 'Total=%d  Passed=%d  Failed=%d' % (num_passed + num_failed,
00021                                           num_passed, num_failed)
